<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Kobold Dragon Mage](/Monsters.aspx?ID=274)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Kobold dragon mages use magic to carry out their secret schemes. The presence of a dragon mage in a kobold warren is one of the greatest testaments to the kobolds’ claim to draconic heritage.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Kobold Dragon Mage](/Monsters.aspx?ID=274)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 213</row>

**Perception** +5; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +6, [Dragon Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +10, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +8, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** +2

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 25

**Resistances**
poison 5 (see dragonscaled)

**Dragonscaled** A kobold dragon mage’s resistance depends on the color of its scales: **Black** acid 5, **Blue** electricity 5, **Green** poison 5, **Red** fire 5, **White** cold 5.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6-1 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +3 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4-1 bludgeoning

**Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 20
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) (4 slots)

**Illusory Retreat** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104), [Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Requirements** The kobold dragon mage is adjacent to at least one enemy. **Effect** The dragon mage creates an illusion of itself in its square and then becomes invisible (with the effects of a 2nd-level [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) spell) for 1d4 rounds. The dragon mage can move up to half its Speed, but it must end its movement in a space that's not adjacent to any enemeies. This is a 1st-level spell that requires a somatic component.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The dragon mage deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

</column>
